website_summaries.verdict: A rugged and attractive storage bench that can hold up to 5 cubic feet of toys, lawn tools, and other items.
pros: Sturdy resin construction, with an attractive wood and stone-like look
5 cubic feet of storage in all
Comes in 7 parts that are easy to assemble
Seats up to 2 adults, for a total maximum weight with storage of 400 pounds
cons: Lid is not hinged or attached to the rest of the bench, and in some instances can warp over time

customer_reviews.title: 6 years and still like new
customer_reviews.text: Okay, this is the ultimate review of this product. We purchased it from amazon back in September 2009 Yes, 2009 and its been sitting out in the weather for over 6 years now. It still looks like new and hasn't warped in any way or lost its shape. Our family is bigger now and we wanted another one, to put around the fire pit. We keep our fatwood, matches, and other stuff in it and all stays dry. Yes, even when we had 8 inches of rain last month. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my condo deck, holds 6 life jackets plus several beach towels, attractive, easy to clean, and SURPRISINGLY comfortable!. Also, this is an attractive piece. I wondered if it would look OK with my other deck furniture (mostly teak), but it looks just fine. It was easy for me, a 70 year old woman, to put together. I do, however, recommend using a power screw-driver to insure the screws are adequately installed.
customer_reviews.author: carolanne

customer_reviews.title: The bench did not have predrilled holes for screws . I was disappointed I got sent faulty pieces .
customer_reviews.text: The bench that came did not have predrilled holes . Pieces did not snap in correctly. The back of bench did not fit in Slots . Other people got the bench with predrilled holes Their bench pieces fit . I did not have a good experience with the pieces With no holes for screws and pieces that didn’t fit . Otherwise it was a pretty bench in photo
customer_reviews.author: sbr222

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking and Useful
customer_reviews.text: This is a great-looking and useful outdoor bench. It came in two separate shipments two days apart, which worried me, but when both packages arrived it was easy(ish) to put together. My son dropped one of the screws into a hole in the plastic, never to be seen again, but I just skipped that screw and it was no problem. We use it to keep his sand toys in, and I sit on it while he plays.
customer_reviews.author: Kmom

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor toy storage!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom to organize the grand-kids toys in her backyard. She loves it. It is very durable (not flimsy plastic) and serves its purpose well. It is also pleasing to the eye and does not necessary appear to be toy storage or a kid product. I would say it can comfortably seat two average sized adults and can store a descent amount of backyard toys (trucks, shovels, buckets!). Thinking of buying one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Thehappycactus

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS BENCH!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storing my large outdoor chess pieces. Sturdy, and was easy to put together by myself. Looks fantastic in my yard and I couldn't be happier with the quality, especially for such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: alisha mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: It's not a toy to me.  It works great on my patio/porch
customer_reviews.text: This item had a large scratch on the seat because the shipper had practically demolished the packaging. The seat looked like a sway back horse. I didn't care because if the item is on the porch/patio it will become damaged to a certain extent and I feel as it is poly something the seat will settle down. I like it. Those of you who are lucky enough to have it show up perfect- lucky you in this imperfect world. The shipper has no control over the shipper except not to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: See “ultimate review” for perfect feedback!
customer_reviews.text: This bench literally took 20 minutes to put together and it’s really attractive for being made of resin. This is why I love Step2 and will continue to buy their products when they’re an available option for anything!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra N Simonton

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great bench and it’s comfortable too. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our Pool Area
customer_reviews.text: This was a great price and has been a good bench that stands up to the weather. note: It is NOT waterproof, your contents will get wet! Also, the lid is not attached so when you lift it to put things in, it isn't hinged, so it will come off completely!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Good product!!!  Works as listed!!!
customer_reviews.text: This works well and does exactly what I need it to do! I would purchase again!!!
customer_reviews.author: James Southard

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and use if for adults to sit on at the table - just added cushion. Holds lots of toys!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Lins

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits a good amount of our kids’ outdoor toys! It has a good weight limit so I feel safe sitting on it with another adult and kids without feeling like it is going to bow
customer_reviews.author: Erin N Allen

customer_reviews.title: Blends in...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Looks great, quite functional. Leaks slightly with heavy rains but not enough to really effect anything. The bench area flexes a bit but doesn't look as if it will get any worse. Would definitely buy it again,!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mctphilly

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bench
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and can fit all my sons toys. Love that it doubles as a sitting bench.
customer_reviews.author: K. Miles

customer_reviews.title: So easy to put together!  6 screws
customer_reviews.text: I love the brick look and it's very comfortable and very light. Great amount of storage as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Stambaugh

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd outdoor bench in 12 years, it has endured rain, snow, sun, its an all weather bench. We love the product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty bench
customer_reviews.text: Me and the wife love it - actually is pretty rugged. Then again lets see how it does in the AZ summer heat. I'd get a couple more but now they stopped the no charge shipping so it's not worth paying $60 more to ship. Came in 2 boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Krieger

customer_reviews.title: cute as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the fact that it is not very durable.
customer_reviews.author: stacey osborne

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench, it looks exactly like the picture, it went together pretty easily, it holds quite a bit in the storage area and is very sturdy. This was a good bargin
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love my Step2 Outdoof Bench
customer_reviews.text: Awesome outdoor storage bench. Looks great on the patio and holds a lot of toys!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good if you open it up often.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to keep my outdoor cushions until the mice decided to make it their home.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hems

customer_reviews.title: Stone Storage Bench
customer_reviews.text: We love this little bench. It's durable and looks great in our little playground area. The Grand kids climb on it, sit on it, and love storing their toys in it. We bought two of them.
customer_reviews.author: mixedup1

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: This is well worth the few extra dollars. It is well made, fairly easy to put together, although the "pre-drilled" holes were really just a dimple. I used a small nail and hammer to start and then the screw went in easily. It is a very sturdy bench and the night after we put it together it rained and the cushions in it were nice and dry the next morning. We are definitely happy with this purchase and plan to buy another for our other porch.
customer_reviews.author: Constance

customer_reviews.title: Very Practical and Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor bench is very useful for storage and easy for a child or adult to get on and off of. It is functional and looks nice, which works for us all around. July 2014 Update: Purchased this bench back in 2006 and still using it today. It works really to keep the items inside dry and is very sturdy to have lasted this long. It has slightly changed colors from the sun beating down on it, and does tend to collect some dust inside, but nothing major. Still recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M Redo

customer_reviews.title: Functional with a bit of installation
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bench for my wife. She loves it. A bit pricey for plastic pieces that snap together. But worth it for the storage. Had to drill a few holes to put the screws in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Andres

customer_reviews.title: O boy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my twin grand sons as a toy box. But it is a good fort, jumping platform, and hide away bed for 2 inventive/destructive boyz.
customer_reviews.author: old dude

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble in 30 mins
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble in 30 mins! Very sturdy and good looking! We know it's for kids but wife and kids sit in comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, and probably the easiest assembly of a product ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good- attractive, sturdy, and probably the easiest assembly of a product I've ever had in my life.
customer_reviews.author: JJ M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. Perfect size and durability for adults and children to sit on as well as provides plenty of storage for outdoor toys. Very easy to assemble, only took bout 10 mins and has kept all my kids toys dry and safe amongst all the rain and snow we get on the east coast!
customer_reviews.author: Am

customer_reviews.title: Decent for easy work load
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, considering it's plastic, but it is very uncomfortable to sit on. Assembly is weak, if you pull it a few feet it keeps falling apart (stays together though if you don't move it) Certainly can't have anything inside of any weight, the floor will start bending and giving in (I had pool supplies in it)and then dare move it a few inches...But all in all it seems to last.
customer_reviews.author: Rescue Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store some bird seeds and other items on my lower deck. I love it! Super easy to put together - fast shipping - cute as can be and extremely practical. This is not a kid's typical toy chest (I'm over 55.) This storage bench is very sturdy and very unique looking. The added bonus is that it's very comfortable just for sitting in.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crickenberger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one and it was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: AL G

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Not really a toy but a great outdoor bench. Storage in the seat can hold things like the hose when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley A. Frey

customer_reviews.title: Storage Bench
customer_reviews.text: Cute and practical; very easy to assemble. Looks good enough to use in the house, as well as outside!! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna R.

customer_reviews.title: Step 2 Storage Bench
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bench back in Nov. and just started putting it together. I bought it in fall and didn't want to set it up until spring. Just opened the box and only to find out I was shorted one box. I now have 1/2 of a storage box. I only have the back,bottom,front and back of the box, no sides or ends of the box.. I can't return it because of the time limit on returns. So I guess I'm stuck with a pile of plastic junk. If you order this item, make sure you get 2 boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Bobs welding

product_meta.title: Step2 Outdoor Storage Bench - Durable Garden Deck Seat with Roomy Storage
product_meta.description:
Realistic stone-textured bench that will provide you with comfort when you sit and storage for your outdoor accessories.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
With a classy stone look, sturdy resin construction, and large storage capacity, this durable and lightweight "stone" bench is perfect for gardens, poolsides, and decks. Maintenance-free materials are combined with natural colors and realistic textures in this remarkable outdoor bench.
feature_bullets: This outdoor bench with storage has a lid that opens to reveal 5 cubic feet (0.14 cubic meters) of roomy storage.
It offers comfortable seating for up to two adults.
The maximum weight on bench is 400 pounds (181.44 kg).
The inside storage dimensions of this storage seat are 11 inches vertical depth x 46.5 inches horizontal width x 16.5 inches length.
The storage bench outdoor requires minimal adult assembly.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars92 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
